## SubscribeQueue() function

Registers observable to specified queue, this observable is added to WebSocketClientResponse.output

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function SubscribeQueue(name: string, options?: SubscribeQueueOptions): (target: WebSocketClient, _propertyKey: string, descriptor: any) => any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Name of subscription to be subscribed to |
|  options | <code>SubscribeQueueOptions</code> | Options for subscribe queue |

<b>Returns:</b>

`(target: WebSocketClient, _propertyKey: string, descriptor: any) => any`
